prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        After mapping ingredients, optionally rewrite the cooking steps to reference the chosen products.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {

    ],

    ],

    ],

    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],

      "Gluten"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "10-Min Tuna Chutney Quesadilla Melt",
  "description": "A quick, one-pan tuna and cheddar melt with a mild chutney twist for familiar SA/Modern American flavor. Crispy on the outside, creamy inside.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "instructions": [
    "Drain the tuna well. In a bowl, mix tuna, mayonnaise, onion, chutney, a squeeze of lemon, and a pinch of salt and pepper.",
    "Place the tortilla wraps on a board; sprinkle half the cheddar cheese over one half of a tortilla.",
    "Spread the tuna mixture over the cheese and top with the remaining cheddar. Fold the tortilla over to form a half-moon.",
    "Heat olive oil in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.",
    "Cook the folded tortilla 2–3 minutes per side until golden and the cheese is melted, pressing lightly with a spatula.",
    "Transfer to a plate, rest 1 minute, then slice into wedges.",
    "Serve with the remaining lemon wedge to squeeze over just before eating."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortilla wraps",
      "quantity": "1 large (25–30 cm)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tuna",
      "quantity": "1 small can (120 g), drained well"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mayonnaise",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chutney",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cheddar cheese",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "grated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1 wedge + extra squeeze"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "Pinch"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Egg",
      "Fish",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
